Key Match Events: Shai Gilgeous-Alexander scored 33 points, 11 rebounds, and 6 assists
Lu Dort scored 14 points in the final two and a half minutes
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Thunder extended their winning streak to 15 games
Aaron Wiggins saw valuable minutes and was a volume scorer for Oklahoma City
Others: The Thunder had to fend off the Celtics until the final buzzer
The Thunder have another tough battle in its next game, taking on the Cleveland Cavaliers at 6:00 p.m. CT on Jan. 8 on the road
